ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese
1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for easier mixing and smoother texture
Mix cheese and seasonings thoroughly before rolling in pecans
Chill for at least 2 hours before serving to help the ball hold its shape
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the preparer through creating a smooth, flavorful cheese mixture and achieving an even pecan coating for an attractive presentation.
